page.title: 10Education
page.content: There is one primary (infants and juniors) school called Isycoed to the east of the area.It is an old building but has an additional "mobile" classroom in the playground.There are children attending. There is an Adult Training Centre in the middle of the estate where older youths who are slow to acquire academic skills do extra learning.Those children in the other parts of the area attend St.Deiniol's Primary School (Marchwiel),Gwenfro Primary (Wrexham).Younger ones attend Caia Park Nursery school in Wrexham, and those over eleven years of age attend St.David's School, or one of the other Schools outside our designated block.
